feature_model.name: Credit
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Credit (Credit) :m Rewards (Rewards) :m Fees_and_Charges (Fees_and_Charges) :m Minimum_Credit_Limit (Minimum_Credit_Limit) :m Interest_Rates (Interest_Rates) :m Maximum_Credit_Limit (Maximum_Credit_Limit) :m Interest_Rate (Interest_Rate) :m Payments (Payments) :m Variable_Interest_Rate (Variable_Interest_Rate) :m card_product (card_product) :o Card (Card) :o Name_on_Card (Name_on_Card) :o Multiple_Cards (Multiple_Cards) :o Fuel_Savings (Fuel_Savings) :o GO_Business_Rewards (GO_Business_Rewards) :o Interest_Free_Days (Interest_Free_Days) :o Cash_Advance_Rate (Cash_Advance_Rate) :o Fly_by_Points (Fly_by_Points) :o Balance_Transfer_Rate (Balance_Transfer_Rate) :o Deferred (Deferred)
